name: Zombie Rush (Hexahwave, Rieps, HisuiNoAme, GenaroJSC)
description:
Zombie Rush (Hexahwave, Rieps, HisuiNoAme, GenaroJSC) is a game developed by HisuiNoAme, GenaroJSC and Hexahwave. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Zombie Rush (Hexahwave, Rieps, HisuiNoAme, GenaroJSC) on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
